name: RootsFill
description:
A game made for the Weekly game jam 166 with the theme "Roots".

In this game your goal is to fill all the ground with your roots in 5 levels. Be carreful ! You can't plant your root where you already have one !

Use Arrow keys to move in the ground.

Credits : 

  • Graphics :  Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/assets/platformer-art-pixel-redux
  • Sounds Effects : 
    • Grow : Zapsplat https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/trees-and-branches/page/2/
    • Lose : congusbongus https://opengameart.org/content/total-fail
    • Victory : Listener https://opengameart.org/content/win-sound-effect
  • Sounds : 
    • Main Theme : remaxim https://opengameart.org/content/pacman-clone-background-music
